title: Men of War: Assault Squad. Game of the Year Edition (2011/PC/ReP
description:
DESCRIPTION:
Independent addition to the famous military history strategies.
At this time, fans of the famous series "Behind Enemy Lines 2" will take part in major battles of WWII, commanding the troops of the USSR, USA, UK, Germany or Japan. In addition to the multiplayer modes, familiar from previous projects to the attention of the players offered new versions of the battles, including the team.
In battle, players can not only command the whole army, but by controlling the tank, destroy enemy fortifications, or, acting as a mere foot soldier, his comrades to cover the retreat with a gun in his hand, which allows you to immerse yourself in an atmosphere of wartime.
